original_text: He also said to the disciples, “There was a rich man who had a manager, and charges were brought to him that this man was wasting his possessions.
korean_text: 또한 제자들에게 이르시되 어떤 부자에게 청지기가 있는데 그가 주인의 소유를 낭비한다는 말이 그 주인에게 들린지라

sentences.original_text: He also said to the disciples,
and charges were brought to him
that this man was wasting his possessions.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 자기 소유를 허비하고 있다는 것이라.
